works.description: To re-source is to re-generate, re-energize, re-mix and re-lax and the appropriate space for this multi-tasking is, more than ever before, the home and its vibrant centre – the kitchen, says Bruno Lizotte, Design Manager at Electrolux. The renowned home appliance manufacturer lately asked Masters students at the Domus Academy in Milan to rethink kitchen appliances, and selected a total of nine concepts. These concepts, under the theme “ReSource,” were showcased to coincide with 2011 Milan Design Week. Lizotte further said…
